name: Dead of Night (itch) (Robbytaku, blusoulfyre, JulianHerman, Brian Coleman, JackHill, mikeschubee, Mint16384)
name_original: Dead of Night (itch) (Robbytaku, blusoulfyre, JulianHerman, Brian Coleman, JackHill, mikeschubee, Mint16384)
description:
Oh god... you're the only human left in the quarantine zone. Do you have what it takes to survive when all that's left of your town is the walking dead? In this zombie horde survival FPS, your objective is to survive as long as possible. With your trusty shotgun and four safe houses scattered around the quarantine zone, you must do whatever it takes to stay alive. Kill zombies, power the safe houses, and last as long as you can in this hell. Controls: W - Move Forward S - Move Backwards A - Move Left D - Move Right R - Reload LMB - Fire Space - Jump  Mouse - Look Around Credits: Brian Coleman: Level Design, Tech Art
Julian Herman: Design, UI/UX
Jack Hill: Level Design, Programming, UI/UX
Mikey Schubert: Programming, 3D Art, Animation
Tristan Sistare: Programming, Animation
Robby Williams: Producer, UI/UX
Hannah Wright: Music, Audio Designer
